<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_ace_content_block</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_ace_content_block">type=9b2e3d0e6b110110da18ec188e44af13^EQ<item display_table="sn_ace_content_block_type" display_value="Search Config" endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="9b2e3d0e6b110110da18ec188e44af13"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Restrict Search Config CB creation</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
var contentBlockGr = new GlideRecord('sn_ace_content_block'); contentBlockGr.addQuery('ace_config', current.ace_config); contentBlockGr.addQuery('type', current.type); contentBlockGr.query(); if (contentBlockGr.next() && contentBlockGr.canRead()) { gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Search Config content block already exists')); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-22 06:43:56</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1902990aebb90110da1861c59c5228e4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Restrict Search Config CB creation</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Admin Experience Framework" source="sn_ace">5df6db91ebe4011090fa99602a52289e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Admin Experience Framework">5df6db91ebe4011090fa99602a52289e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1902990aebb90110da1861c59c5228e4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-30 14:51:51</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1902990aebb90110da1861c59c5228e4"/> </record_update>
